content: night blooms is a wonderfully wooly hat combining magpie fibers nest worsted and biches et bûches le gros silk & mohair in a simple but dramatic colourwork motif the different textures of the yarns make for an unexpected pairing and the fabric created is reminiscent of the flocked velvet wallpapers of yesteryear **yarn** magpie fibers nest 100% non-superwash corriedale 210 y 192 m / 100 g mc - 1 skein - or approximately 138 yds 126 m of worsted weight yarn biches & bûches le gros silk & mohair 72% mohair / 28% silk 162 y 148 m / 50 g cc - 1 skein - or approximately 56 yds 51 m of a similar worsted weight yarn black / gold version shown in nest worsted in midnight velvet biches et bûches le gros silk & mohair in dark gold yellow / turquoise version shown in magpie fibers nest worsted in twilight honey and biches et bûches le gros silk & mohair in dark blue turquoise samples shown include lovafur faux fur pompoms in black and beige
